name: Family Trouble Full Release
description:
There was a happy family with two sons a father and a mother. Everything was fine until the youngest brother suddenly became hostile. At first it wasn't that bad and they just pretended to be normal. But after a few months it became worse and worse. It even got so bad that he wanted to fight against everyone who got near him. The oldest brother was afraid and decided to disappear. He began to travel across the country. After a few years of traveling and staying the night in a B&B something horrible happens…

Well the answer is quite easy. I put a lot of work into this game and it would be nice to get something back.

Where does the money go to?
Al the money made from this game will be spent to buy a license on Steam Drive. It would be awesome to get this game on Steam so that’s also the main reason why it isn’t free.
